name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-personal-dashboard
title: Personal Dashboard
shortDescription: The Personal Dashboard app, built using the SharePoint framework, offers a versatile solution for organizations across various platforms such as Teams, Outlook, and Office. This app enables seamless integration with both public and enterprise APIs, allowing users to effortlessly consume and leverage their desired APIs within their personalized workspace.
longDescription: The Personal Dashboard app, built using the SharePoint framework, offers a versatile solution for organizations across various platforms such as Teams, Outlook, and Office. This app enables seamless integration with both public and enterprise APIs, allowing users to effortlessly consume and leverage their desired APIs within their personalized workspace.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
